title: adjunct_tort_plot_dp_align
description: Tool to display the rigid-body alignment parameters from TORTOISE's DIFFPREP, useful for analyzing subject motion in DWI data.

input_file.title: DIFFPREP Transform File
input_file.description: Name of DIFFPREP-produced file to parse, probably ending in '_transformations.txt'.

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: Base of output files; can contain path information. Should *not* include any extension.

enorm_max.title: Enorm Max Value
enorm_max.description: Specify max value of y-axis of enorm plot in SVG image. Useful for having a constant value across a study.

enorm_hline.title: Enorm Horizontal Line Value
enorm_hline.description: Specify value of a horizontal, dotted, bright cyan line for the enorm plot in SVG image. Can help with visualization.

no_svg.title: Disable SVG Plot
no_svg.description: Opt to turn off even checking to plot an SVG version of the figure.
